website_summaries.verdict: We love the idea of the rose shape for special events and occasions; but these floating LED candles will become pricey if you need a lot of them.
pros: LED floating candles with a pretty rose shape
Available in white, warm white, and multi-colored
Comes with batteries that provide long-lasting glow
cons: You only get four candles for the price

customer_reviews.title: WAY smaller than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these expecting them to be at least the size of a large grapefruit, but they are about the size of a tennis ball. They are actually made of wax even though they are battery operated and they look more realistic than the product photos do. They are water activated, which is pretty cool, and come with batteries. Overall, I wish they were bigger, but I'm content with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice light output, but......
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using these a week but I see a problem worth mentioning. The lights lit up as soon as I put them in my patio pond which is what they are supposed to do. They turned off when I removed them from the water. If you leave them in the water 24/7 the little sensors on the bottoms start to corrode turning green. When I took them out of the water after a couple of days they would not turn off, probably due to the corrosion I mentioned. The lights are okay for what they are. Probably the type of thing I'll toss at the end of summer and buy new ones next summer.
customer_reviews.author: robinh567

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: These were more than I ever expected. I placed them in mason jars and lined my walkway up to the door. Now I will reuse them for a baby shower I’m hosting
customer_reviews.author: rarccr

customer_reviews.title: Only lights up when in water.
customer_reviews.text: These are the coolest candles. Hubby is an electrician and he even thought they were great.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Westmoreland

customer_reviews.title: Hard to believe placing them in water turns them on.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two boxes because 4 candles didn't make as much of a display. They reliably turn on when placed in water. A couple of times they turned on again because water dripped off onto the table where I put them.
customer_reviews.author: Pranmere

customer_reviews.title: Nice light.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughters wedding. Not sure weather we'll put them in the pool or use them another way yet but I am happy with the purchase. They are very well made and lit up as soon as they hit the water.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Sellers

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my sons wedding to use in the centerpiece. Very pretty. They look much nicer in person.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: These candles are beautiful and very bright
customer_reviews.text: These candles are beautiful and very bright. Incredibly simple....just dropped in water in 2 wine glasses for our sweetheart table. Plus price was great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... my friend - we both were stunned by how cool these are
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift - enthusiastically received by my friend - we both were stunned by how cool these are.
customer_reviews.author: mamalissa

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: They are very small. They do what they say and are very nice, just very small.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Manning

customer_reviews.title: Too small but pretty
customer_reviews.text: Way too small... fits in the palm of my hand, but they are pretty and they work
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Simone

customer_reviews.title: Votive
customer_reviews.text: Just received so have not had a chance to use. They look great
customer_reviews.author: Janet Waters

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used these for my wedding and they were amazing!!! Will post pictures when I get them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What was expected.
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected. A few were sucked into the filter. 1 retained water and has stayed 'lit'.
customer_reviews.author: The Kitchen Pixie'-*°•~`*-°•

customer_reviews.title: Pretty to look at, but won't last
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful candles however the battery life is very short and the bottom will rust and lights will not work.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, just what I was looking for. Really cool that the battery is replaceable.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S. Murray

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my pool, but are smaller than looked. I used them in glass vases, looked stunning
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Flower Lights
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wedding and they look so real and are absolutely stunning would definitely recommend for anyone
customer_reviews.author: Susanne LaFleche

customer_reviews.title: Great option to floating candles
customer_reviews.text: Love these, I use them in my memory vases instead of candles
customer_reviews.author: andrea stinger

product_meta.title: (Pack of 4) Warm White Color Flameless Wax LED Water Floating Rose Candle Light for Wedding or Event Decoration./LED Floating Candle Light in Flower Shape (Warm White)
product_meta.description:
Color:Warm WhiteDescription: 

- These Floating LED Lights light up in contact with the water. 

- Just dry them off and use again. 

- They adopt replaceable batteries (CR2032) and are already installed. These batteries are replaceable! 

- These reusable, floating LED lights in water, are waterproof and flameless and are thus perfect for lighting up vases, bowls, or any water filled containers. 

- They can turn a boring bowl into a beautiful and exciting centerpiece. These Floating Candle lights are often used for event design lamp; make great party favors as well. 

Specifications: 

1.Size(D x H): 3 x 1.48 in 

2.Color: Warm White 

3.Battery last time: 30-70 hours 

4.Main material: Wax 

Package included: 4 X LED floating candle
feature_bullets: Great for wedding arrangements, centerpiece that bring a romantic atmosphere.
Water-activated, the light bright up automatically when put the candle into water, and turn off when remove from water.
Flameless, smokeless and long lasting, safe to use.
Made of real paraffin wax. Reusable.
Runs on 1xCR2032 battery, can last more than 24 hours continuously. replace new batteries to use again and again.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars55 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
